test_bo_complete_workflow.title: BO Complete Workflow - Login, Relogin, and Sanity Testing
test_bo_complete_workflow.goal: Validate complete BO environment workflow including admin login with OTP, account relogin, and regression sanity testing

test_bo_login_only.title: BO Admin Login with OTP Authentication
test_bo_login_only.goal: Verify BO admin login functionality with username, password, and OTP verification

test_bo_accounts_navigation_only.title: BO Accounts Navigation and List Verification
test_bo_accounts_navigation_only.goal: Validate navigation to BO accounts page and verify account list display functionality

test_relogin_sanity_home_verification.title: BO Relogin Session - Home Page Verification
test_relogin_sanity_home_verification.goal: Validate that relogin session successfully loads main application home page

test_relogin_sanity_navigation.title: BO Relogin Session - Navigation Testing
test_relogin_sanity_navigation.goal: Verify navigation functionality and menu accessibility in relogin session
